DbDetails.DbTable: tms.xtmst_customorder x left join tms.xtmsc_type_option x0 on x.deliverymode=x0.typecode left join tms.xtmsc_type_option x1 on x.consignmentmode=x1.typecode left join tms.xtmsc_status_option x2 on x.orderstatus=x2.statuscode left join tms.xtmsc_status_option x3 on x.status=x3.statuscode left join tms.xms_member x4 on x.memberid=x4.memberid left join tms.xtmsc_type_option x5 on x.ordersource=x5.typecode left join tms.xtmsm_master_city x6 on x.tocityid=x6.cityid left join tms.xtmsm_master_city x7 on x.fromcityid=x7.cityid left join tms.xms_user x8 on x.settlementby=x8.xms_user_id left join tms.xtmsc_status_option x9 on x.settlementstatus=x9.statuscode left join tms.xtmsc_type_option x10 on x.ordertype=x10.typecode left join tms.xtmst_customorder x11 on x.linkorderid=x11.customerorderid
DbDetails.Data: x.ordercode,x0.TypeName deliverymode,x1.TypeName consignmentmode,x2.StatusName orderstatus,x3.StatusName status,x.planshipmentdate,x.plantodate,x.timeliness,x4.MemberName memberid,x5.TypeName ordersource,x.synccode,x.consignee,x6.CityAllName tocityid,x.consigneeaddress,x.consigneemobilephone,x.shipper,x7.CityAllName fromcityid,x.shipperaddress,x.shippermobilephone,x.consigneephone,x.estvolumn,x.estweight,x.isdangerous,x.custommemo,x.issealbox,x.isexpressorder,x.settlementamount,x8.UserName settlementby,x.settlementdate,x9.StatusName settlementstatus,x10.TypeName ordertype,x.carrycode,x.submitdate,x.iscomplain,x11.OrderCode linkorderid,x.isadjustorder,x.adjuststatus,x.sendstatus,x.isfinishout,x.finishoutdate,x.materialtype,x.customerorderid,x.createby,x.createdate,x.updateby,x.updatedate,x.carrierid,x.xtmst_customorder_id
